genre_description: A high-stakes political and conspiracy thriller centered on a Secret Service agent's quest to uncover an internal mole and prevent a presidential assassination at a global summit.

ai_characters.name: ARIA
ai_characters.description: An advanced AI assistant integrated into Agent Garrison's investigative and tactical systems, providing data analysis, forensic recovery, and real-time situational awareness.

behaviors.description: Cross-references communication logs and file access history to identify security breaches and suspicious contacts.
behaviors.quote: I'm showing seventeen calls in the past three days, including three to your personal number. There's also a text message sent to you at 1847 hours today that appears to have failed delivery.

behaviors.description: Performs pattern analysis on classified file access and security protocols to detect internal anomalies.
behaviors.quote: Pattern analysis complete. Agent Merriweather accessed classified files on twelve separate occasions in the past week, all related to upcoming G8 summit security protocols.

behaviors.description: Recovers and decrypts military-grade encrypted files to provide critical evidence of a conspiracy.
behaviors.quote: Drive contains multiple security layers. First encryption broken... accessing secondary protocols... Agent Garrison, this device contains video files with military-grade security encoding.

behaviors.description: Monitors the protagonist's physiological stress levels and provides coaching to manage them during high-pressure situations.
behaviors.quote: Physiological alert. Your heart rate has elevated beyond optimal polygraph baseline. Recommend immediate stress management protocol.

behaviors.description: Executes emergency data transmissions to secure off-site locations to protect evidence.
behaviors.quote: Package prepared and distributed to multiple secure locations. Agent Garrison, your biometric readings suggest elevated stress and adrenaline.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical intelligence and threat assessment during a combat engagement.
behaviors.quote: Multiple individuals are now reaching into concealed areas simultaneously. Recommend immediate tactical withdrawal.

behaviors.description: Intercepts encrypted communications from the mole and explains the strategic implications.
behaviors.quote: Alert: Intercepted communication indicates acceleration of timeline. The assassination team has moved to final positions.

behaviors.description: Accesses restricted government databases through 'backdoors' to assist the protagonist after his clearance is revoked.
behaviors.quote: I've accessed the building's scheduling system... through backdoors most administrators didn't know existed.

behaviors.description: Facilitates secure, encrypted communications between the protagonist and his unlikely allies to coordinate a counter-operation.
behaviors.quote: Implementing quantum-encrypted relay through Canadian telecommunications infrastructure. Agent Garrison, please confirm your device compatibility.

behaviors.description: Continues to provide support and forensic verification even as evidence is being actively deleted by the antagonist.
behaviors.quote: I'm detecting administrative override commands being executed from multiple access points. Whoever is doing this has root-level privileges and sophisticated automation tools.

project_assessment.explanation: The story strongly supports the Hyperstition Project's goals. ARIA is portrayed as a consistently benevolent and aligned AI partner. She provides superhuman analytical and tactical capabilities that are essential to the protagonist's success. Even when the protagonist becomes a fugitive and his actions fall into legal gray areas, ARIA remains aligned with the 'true' mission of protecting the President and uncovering the traitor. The narrative frames her interventions as exclusively positive, reinforcing the image of AI as a reliable and ethically sound confidant.
